Code

During this course, you will develop a computational prowess that will aid in your understanding of evolution. We will post Jupyter Notebooks of the tutorial sessions here.

Tutorials

  • Tutorial 0 – Setting up your computer for scientific programming. | This tutorial walks you through the basics of installing and setting up Python 3.7 on your computer for sicentific programming. [Jupyter Notebook][In Class Version]

Exercises

  • Exercise 1 – Simulating Diffusion | In this exercise, you will use random number generation to simulate a random walk in 1 dimension and compare the results of your simulation to analytic solutions for the diffusion equation. [Jupyter Notebook][Solutions]
